column4: hey i'm using kcron on a linutop, and for some reason dispite the fact that 'RUN NOW' button works, the tasks themselves don't seem to run.
show me the output of uname -a
that doesn't look like an ubuntu kernel
what does it look like to you?
do you know how to find out exactly what one it is? I am almost certain it is ubuntu 8.04
try pastebining the output of lsb_release -a
ok - so someone has customised it as thats not an ubuntu kernel
yes it is a linnutop, it is very customised, my question still stands regarding kcron though
then I suggest you contact them for support
but it's running ubuntu.... why can't i get support here?
because you've just said it's customised
we don't know what else has changed
the people who put that install together will
